data.text: Wɛlɛ wooi nii ɠa Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI boni GALA goo wo nui Zelemi ma, é lo Ɓaɓilɔne ʋa, ta Ɓaɓilɔne nuiti ta-yooi:
«À zeze ga niima wooi zii ɠiligiti saama,
Mazɔlɔɔ zii ta ɠa ʋaazu daalɔɠɔma,
« ‹Naama ziɛgi zu, naama yeei,
‹Ta Siyɔn ʋelei maaɠaazaɠabo,
Nà-nuɓusɛiti ti ɠɛa ɠulani ga baala kpulugiti ti loai ya.
Niiti ti ɠɛni ɠomisu ga tiye,
« ‹À ʋela, wo ɠula Ɓaɓilɔne ʋa,
Mazɔlɔɔ nà ʋaazu zii wolaiti buzeɠezu,
Ta loo Ɓaɓilɔne nuiti ta-yooi zu,
« ‹Ungo, wa zoo wo ɠoozunɛ,
À wɛlɛ lɛɛ wo zɔlɔɔ zooi ʋa,
«Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-ziimaleʋei maaʋele ma
Wo pɛ mɛɛn ʋili nuiti,
À maalati, wo kɔɔɠɔ ɓeei loo daalɔɠɔma mini-o-mini!
À ná-ani zuwu vaza nuiti kula zea,
«Izilayɛle ɠɛni nɔ ga baalagi é looni ya,
Naa ɠa é ba, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii,
Nà Izilayɛle ɠaaɠalesu ma ná-sasai zu,
Naama ziɛgi zu, naama volo ná,
« ‹Wo pɛ à li, wo laalɛ Melatayime yooi wu.
Nu ɠa kɔɔɠɔ zɔngɔi mɛnisu zooi zu,
Ee, naa ɠɛɛʋɛ nɛi ga ɠite?
Gè balii ɓɛtɛni, gè da è ɠɔɠɔwu,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-kɔɔɠɔ zɔɔla makɛsuʋɛ laalaoga,
À ʋa pɔ bɛ, wo zeɠe eteai zu ná pɛ,
À ta-zalaʋusu ɠɛzɛiti kpein paa, ta-nikɛ zinɛi tɔnati pɛ,
Wɛlɛ, nu ɠa pela nuiti gooi mɛnisu
« ‹À mɛɛn ʋili nuiti pɛ toli,
Naa ɠa é ba, ná-buzeɠe niinɛgiti kpein ta loo bu taazuʋɛ koi yɔɠɔzuʋɛti,
‹Gè laalɛa è wu, Ɓaɓilɔne, waso nui,›
Waso nui ɠɔɠɔi ɠa ziɠazu, é loo,
«Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii wooi ɠaa:
Nɛ̀i gè ga ti unmɔɔ nui, zobo ka bɛ̀,
« ‹Kɔɔi zeeli Ɓaɓilɔne nuiti ma,
‹Kɔɔi zeeli ná-zɛɛ ɠala goo wo nuiti ma,
Kɔɔi zeeli ná-sooiti ma, ta ná-kɔɔɠɔ wotoloiti,
Fɔɔvɔgi ʋa ná-ziɛiti pɔ,
Naa ɠa é ba, koʋeiti ta ná ɠɛ ga ti-zeizuʋɛ,
Nà ná zuvaza,
‹Nuɓusɛiti ta ʋaazu,
Ta-zalaʋusuiti ta mɛɛinti gaalɛɛzu ta kpɛɛinti.
Ɓaɓilɔne masagi naama wooi mɛnigai ma,
Wɛlɛ, eɠɛ zalai é lɛɛzu,
À woilo dɛɛ faazeikpasui ma
Ti zo fai ma lugi ɠa zooi ɓali,
